      • getConsoleLogger

        public ConsoleLogger getConsoleLogger()
        Description copied from interface: ProviderParameters
        Gets a logger intended for console output.

        This output is intended for provider-oriented messages that are not attached to a single test-set and will normally be written to something console-like immediately.

        Specified by:
        getConsoleLogger in interface ProviderParameters
        Returns:
        A console logger
